achievements.title: Sweet tooth
achievements.desc: Donuts? Really? You lived for 500 years just to eat them?

achievements.title: Vegetarian
achievements.desc: Some creatures prefer juicy fruits instead of sucking blood or eating raw meat. Weaklings.

achievements.title: Carnivore
achievements.desc: Don't mess with me if you want to keep your limbs attached to your body.

achievements.title: Pure Evil
achievements.desc: EVIL!!! FANGS! DEMONS! BLOOD! Yeah. That's the stuff.
